themeCustomizer.title: Theme Customizer
themeCustomizer.description: Customize the theme to your preferences

home.title: Nuxt Shadcn Boilerplate
home.subtitle: A modern, fast and customizable starter template for Nuxt 4 applications with Shadcn UI components.
home.featuresDescription: Everything you need to build beautiful web applications

shadcn.title: Shadcn UI Components
shadcn.content: Ready-to-use components that you can copy and paste into your apps. Accessible, customizable, and open source.

vue.title: Vue.js
vue.content: An accessible, performant and versatile framework for building web user interfaces.

nuxt.title: Nuxt Framework
nuxt.content: Build your next Vue.js application with confidence using Nuxt. An open source framework making web development simple and powerful.

tailwind.title: Tailwind CSS
tailwind.content: A utility-first CSS framework packed with classes that can be composed to build any design, directly in your markup.

i18n.title: i18n Support
i18n.content: Multi-language support out of the box with simple translation keys and seamless language switching.

home.componentsDescription: Explore some of the UI components included in this template
home.readyDescription: Start building your next project today with this boilerplate

components.title: UI Components
components.description: Explore the available Shadcn UI components

footer.description: A modern template that combines the power of Nuxt.js and Shadcn UI components with Tailwind CSS to create beautiful, accessible and responsive web applications.
